author: andschwa
body: - Last PR had a typo in "TestAruments" which caused the configuration not to get picked up - Now bails appropriately if PowerShell wasn't built, instead of rebuilding it every time - Passes `-verbose` to the xUnit runner, not dotnet, so we can see which test failed - Also Make git describe work relative to script, so that you don't have to watch your CWD when running commands from the build module. --- This change is [](https://reviewable.io/reviews/powershell/powershell/1065)
